oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: On the Record with Ralph Emery: Tammy Wynette - 1994-08-24 Reel 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recordings are of the Ralph Emery Show. The show is hosted by Ralph Emery (entertainer), and features Emery in discussion with his guest: Tammy Wynette (musician). The show was recorded on August 24, 1994. The recording is labeled as reel one of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ralph Emery; Tammy Wynette
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Ralph Emery introduces Tammy Wynette -- (00:43) Emery inquires about Wynette's current project: Tammy Wynette Without Walls -- (02:52) A Woman's Needs [excerpt] [featuring Elton John voiceover] (Tammy Wynette and Elton John) -- (03:23) Wynette reflects on recording ""A Woman's Needs"" with Elton John, and Wynette discusses Wynonna Judd being the only female on Wynette's project -- (04:48) Judd reflects on sleeping in when Wynette called -- (05:45) Girl Thang [excerpt] (Wynonna Judd and Tammy Wynette) -- (06:15) Emery inquires as to why Wynette wore a hat for the ""Girl Thang"" music video; additionally, Wynette's contribution to Tammy Wynette: Without Walls is discussed -- (08:16) Emery asks Wynette about her varying health issues -- (13:33) Emery and Wynette address Wynette's addiction to pills, and Emery discusses the similar experience of Johnny Cash at the Betty Ford Center -- (16:57) Emery inquires as to what state Wynette considers home -- (18:58) Emery has Wynette discuss how her aunt Caroline became a sister figure to her -- (20:22) Wynette recalls when she met Elvis Presley -- (22:07) Wynette and Emery discuss Wynette being Miss Tremont High School and her basketball career -- (27:04) Emery asks why Wynette married at such a young age -- (28:09) Emery has Wynette reflect on when she first became inspired to be a performer -- (30:09) Emery and Wynette discuss Wynette's book, that leads up to 1978, and being a hair-dresser
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Wynette, Tammy; Wynette, Tammy, 1942-1998; Emery, Ralph;
